outputs.output_descr: In collaboration with global partners, UNV advocates for volunteerism and documents the contribution of volunteers to peace and development. These efforts aim to influence national policies, legislation, statutory frameworks and budgets and to help strengthen nationally-owned and sustainable volunteer schemes. Specifically, UNV builds on the momentum created during the tenth anniversary of the International Year of Volunteers as well as the first ever State of the World's Volunteerism Report, launched in same year, by advocating for healthy civic engagement through volunteerism, as well as the values that sustain it, are at the core of the post-2015 sustainable development agenda.

project_descr: Fully funded UN Volunteer support to UNV Programme Priority Area 1 (PPA 1) on "Advocacy and National Volunteer Infrastructure"
